TRANSMUTE_ALIAS.label: Convert text url in link html

ENABLE_EMAIL_NOTIFICATIONS.label: Enable Email Notifications

ENABLE_VGALLERY_HTMLTAG_AUTOMATIC.label: Enable in VGallery Automatic HTML Tag Detection

TEXTAREA_DECISION.label: Select textarea type for editing source code
TEXTAREA_DECISION.source_SQL: ( SELECT 'editarea' AS ID , 'Editarea' AS name ) UNION ( SELECT 'codemirror' AS ID , 'Codemirror' AS name )

SEARCH_VGALLERY_LIMIT.label: Vgallery Limit
SEARCH_VGALLERY_LIMIT.source_SQL: SELECT vgallery.name , vgallery.name FROM vgallery INNER JOIN vgallery_nodes ON vgallery_nodes.ID_vgallery = vgallery.ID AND vgallery_nodes.parent = '/' AND vgallery_nodes.name = vgallery.name WHERE vgallery.public = 0 AND vgallery_nodes.visible > 0 ORDER BY vgallery.name

TAGS_VGALLERY_LIMIT.label: Vgallery Limit
TAGS_VGALLERY_LIMIT.source_SQL: SELECT vgallery.ID , vgallery.name FROM vgallery INNER JOIN vgallery_nodes ON vgallery_nodes.ID_vgallery = vgallery.ID AND vgallery_nodes.parent = '/' AND vgallery_nodes.name = vgallery.name WHERE vgallery.public = 0 AND vgallery_nodes.visible > 0 ORDER BY vgallery.name

MOD_SEC_LOGIN_LOGO_FRONTEND.label: Display Logo Box FrontEnd for LogIn

MOD_SEC_LOGOUT_LOGO_FRONTEND.label: Display Logo Box FrontEnd for LogOut

MOD_SEC_LOGO_PATH_FRONTEND.label: Specify in FrontEnd Logo Name in /themes/site/images

MOD_SEC_LOGIN_LOGO_BACKOFFICE.label: Display Logo Box BackOffice for LogIn

MOD_SEC_LOGOUT_LOGO_BACKOFFICE.label: Display Logo Box BackOffice for LogOut

MOD_SEC_LOGO_PATH_BACKOFFICE.label: Specify in BackOffice Logo Name in /themes/site/images

MOD_SEC_SOCIAL_POS.label: Position Social Login
MOD_SEC_SOCIAL_POS.source_SQL: ( SELECT 'pre' AS ID , 'Before Standard Login' AS name ) UNION ( SELECT 'post' AS ID , 'After Standard Login' AS name )

MOD_SEC_SOCIAL_FF.label: Enable FF Single Sign On Login

MOD_SEC_SOCIAL_FF_CLIENT_ID.label: FF Single Sign On Client ID

MOD_SEC_SOCIAL_FF_CLIENT_SECRET.label: FF Single Sign On Client Secret

MOD_SEC_SOCIAL_FF_OAUTH2_URL.label: FF Single Sign On oAuth2 Remote Url

MOD_SEC_SOCIAL_FACEBOOK_DISPLAY_APP_ONLY.label: Facebook Display App only in Page

MOD_SEC_SOCIAL_FACEBOOK_REQUIRE_LIKE_APP.label: Facebook Require Like in App' Page

MOD_SEC_SOCIAL_FACEBOOK_APPSCOPE.label: Facebook App Permission

MOD_SEC_SOCIAL_GOOGLE_APPSCOPE.label: Google App Permission

AREA_ANAGRAPH_AVATAR_TYPE.label: Avatar Type
AREA_ANAGRAPH_AVATAR_TYPE.source_SQL: ( SELECT 'simple' AS ID , 'Simple' AS name ) UNION ( SELECT 'advanced' AS ID , 'Advanced' AS name )

AREA_ANAGRAPH_AVATAR_MODEL.label: Avatar Model

AREA_ANAGRAPH_AVATAR_MODEL_THUMB.label: Avatar Model

AREA_ANAGRAPH_CUSTOM_TYPE.label: Custom Type
AREA_ANAGRAPH_CUSTOM_TYPE.source_SQL: ( SELECT 'null' AS ID , 'N/A' AS name ) UNION ( SELECT anagraph_type.ID , anagraph_type.name FROM anagraph_type WHERE 1 ORDER BY anagraph_type.name )

AREA_ANAGRAPH_BILL_TYPE.label: Bill Type

AREA_ANAGRAPH_SHOW_USER_GROUP.label: User Account Group
AREA_ANAGRAPH_SHOW_USER_GROUP.source_SQL: ( SELECT 'null' AS ID , 'N/A' AS name ) UNION ( SELECT [CM_TABLE_PREFIX]mod_security_groups.gid AS ID , [CM_TABLE_PREFIX]mod_security_groups.name AS name FROM [CM_TABLE_PREFIX]mod_security_groups WHERE 1 ORDER BY [CM_TABLE_PREFIX]mod_security_groups.name )

SITE_OWNER_STATE.label: State
SITE_OWNER_STATE.source_SQL: SELECT [FF_SUPPORT_PREFIX]state.ID , IF(ISNULL([FF_PREFIX]international.description) OR [FF_PREFIX]international.description = '' , [FF_SUPPORT_PREFIX]state.name , [FF_PREFIX]international.description) AS description FROM [FF_SUPPORT_PREFIX]state LEFT JOIN [FF_PREFIX]international ON [FF_PREFIX]international.word_code = [FF_SUPPORT_PREFIX]state.name AND [FF_PREFIX]international.ID_lang = ( SELECT [FF_PREFIX]languages.ID FROM [FF_PREFIX]languages WHERE [FF_PREFIX]languages.code = '[FF_LOCALE]' ) ORDER BY description

AREA_ECOMMERCE_LIMIT_FRONTEND_BY_STOCK.label: FrontEnd: Limit goods visibility by stock

AREA_ECOMMERCE_SHIPPING_LIMIT_STATE.label: Limit Shipping by this State
AREA_ECOMMERCE_SHIPPING_LIMIT_STATE.source_SQL: SELECT [FF_SUPPORT_PREFIX]state.ID , IF(ISNULL([FF_PREFIX]international.description) OR [FF_PREFIX]international.description = '' , [FF_SUPPORT_PREFIX]state.name , [FF_PREFIX]international.description) AS description FROM [FF_SUPPORT_PREFIX]state LEFT JOIN [FF_PREFIX]international ON [FF_PREFIX]international.word_code = [FF_SUPPORT_PREFIX]state.name AND [FF_PREFIX]international.ID_lang = ( SELECT [FF_PREFIX]languages.ID FROM [FF_PREFIX]languages WHERE [FF_PREFIX]languages.code = '[FF_LOCALE]' ) ORDER BY description

AREA_ECOMMERCE_OPERATIONS_PRICE_WITH_VAT.label: Display Price With VAT in Operation

AREA_ECOMMERCE_PREVIEW_USE_SHIPPING_PRIC.label: Doc Preview: Use shipping_price in detail

AREA_ECOMMERCE_PREVIEW_PDF_MARGIN_TOP.label: Margin Top for PDF Doc Preview

AREA_ECOMMERCE_PREVIEW_PDF_MARGIN_BOTTOM.label: Margin Bottom for PDF Doc Preview

AREA_ECOMMERCE_SHOW_ANAGRAPH_SHIPPING_AL.label: Doc Preview: Always show anagraph shipping

AREA_ECOMMERCE_CURRENCY_DEFAULT.label: Default Currency
AREA_ECOMMERCE_CURRENCY_DEFAULT.source_SQL: SELECT ff_currency.symbol , ff_currency.name FROM ff_currency ORDER BY ff_currency.name

SEND_EMAIL_PAYMENT_STATUS_BY_GROUP.label: Switch Email Payment Status by Group

CART_PUBLIC_MONO_FORCE_SHIPPING_PRICE.label: Wishlist force Shipping price to owner

CART_MPAY_SHOW_ALWAYS_NOACCOUNT.label: Always Show no Account in Payment Method

LIMIT_CART_PUBLIC_BYGROUP.label: Limit Cart Public by group
LIMIT_CART_PUBLIC_BYGROUP.source_SQL: SELECT [CM_TABLE_PREFIX]mod_security_groups.gid AS ID , [CM_TABLE_PREFIX]mod_security_groups.name AS name FROM [CM_TABLE_PREFIX]mod_security_groups WHERE 1 ORDER BY [CM_TABLE_PREFIX]mod_security_groups.name

ECOMMERCE_FILTER_MANAGE_LOCATION.label: Operation: Start Location
ECOMMERCE_FILTER_MANAGE_LOCATION.source_SQL: SELECT '0' , 'Location no Set' UNION (SELECT ecommerce_location.ID , ecommerce_location.name FROM ecommerce_location ORDER BY ecommerce_location.name)

ECOMMERCE_FILTER_REPORT_LOCATION.label: Report: Start Location
ECOMMERCE_FILTER_REPORT_LOCATION.source_SQL: SELECT '0' , 'Location no Set' UNION (SELECT ecommerce_location.ID , ecommerce_location.name FROM ecommerce_location ORDER BY ecommerce_location.name)
